sources.title: Four Came to Kill Sartana (1969) Bounty bait meets the West‚Äôs sharpest problem-solver
sources.description:
Sartana vs. four foes‚Äîwhip, knife, muscle, quick-draw‚Äîon a ransom-fueled hunt.
Seven masked raiders led by the shadowy ‚ÄúMormon‚Äù target Clayton City, snatching Susy Prescott and demanding a small fortune. Mayor Frank Colony calls in Sartana, who faces four handpicked specialists‚ÄîBuffalo, Ramirez, Sullivan, and Silky‚Äîwhile unmasking the real mastermind behind the chaos.

Original Title: ‚Ä¶e vennero in quattro per uccidere Sartana! (1969)

metadata.Plot: Seven masked bandits kidnap young Susy, cousin of the mayor of Clayton City, Frank Clonny. Frank accepts the $15,000 ransom requested by the bandits and thinks of a plan which will permit him to recover the money and capture the outlaws.
metadata.Actors: Jeff Cameron, Franco Ricci, Benito Pacifico
